text: Mevaseret Zion () is a suburb of Jerusalem with the administrative status of a local council. Mevaseret Zion is made up of two distinct older townships, Maoz Zion and Mevaseret Yerushalayim. Mevaseret Zion is located on a mountain ridge 750 meters above sea level, on the outskirts of Jerusalem. ==References== ==Other websites== *Municipality website *Harel High School website *Notes on an Iron Age four sheqel scale weight from Mevasseret Yerushalayim Category:Local government in Israel Category:Settlements in Israel
title: Mevaseret Zion
